3053  private: System::Void Magazin_FormClosing(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::FormClosingEventArgs^ e) {
3054  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy na pewno chcesz zamkn program?", "Magazyn", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
3055  {
3056  String^ query = "UPDATE employers set last_log_out=now() WHERE id_employers='" + this->userId + "'";
3057  dbDriver db;
3058  db.update(query);
3059  if (!db.getStatus())
3060  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3061  db.closeConnection();
3062  this->Close();
3063  }
3064  }
3065 
3066  private: Void accountSettings()
3067  {
3068  String^ query = "Select * from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data where common_data.status = 1 AND employers.id_employers ='" + this->userId + "' LIMIT 1";
3069  dbDriver db;
3070  db.selectOne(query);
3071 
3072  if (db.getStatus())
3073  {
3074  this->labelASIDVal->Text = db.result->GetString(0);
3075  this->labelASNameVal->Text = db.result->GetString(1);
3076  this->labelASSurnameVal->Text = db.result->GetString(2);
3077  this->labelASLoginVal->Text = db.result->GetString(3);
3078  this->labelASLastloginVal->Text = Convert::ToString(db.result->GetDateTime(5));
3079  this->labelASLastlogoutVal->Text = Convert::ToString(db.result->GetDateTime(6));
3080  this->relEmployersToCommonData = db.result->GetInt32(7);
3081  int type = db.result->GetInt32(8);
3082  if (type = 1)
3083  {
3084  this->labelASIsAdminVal->Text = "Posiada";
3085  this->checkBoxASIsAdmin->Checked = true;
3086  }
3087  else
3088  this->labelASIsAdminVal->Text = "Brak";
3089  this->labelASAddressVal->Text = db.result->GetString(10);
3090  this->textBoxASPhone->Text = db.result->GetString(11);
3091  this->textBoxASEmail->Text = db.result->GetString(12);
3092  this->labelASOtherInfoVal->Text = db.result->GetString(13);
3093  db.closeConnection();
3094  }
3095  }
3096 
3097  private: System::Void button1_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3098  if (
3099  this->textBoxASEmail->Text->Length > 5
3100  && this->textBoxASEmail->Text->Length < 255
3101  && this->textBoxASPhone->Text->Length > 4
3102  && this->textBoxASPhone->Text->Length < 20
3103  )
3104  {
3105  if (this->textBoxASOldPassword->Text == "" && this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text == "" && this->textBoxASRNewPassword->Text == "")
3106  {
3107  String^ cquery = "UPDATE common_data SET phone='" + this->textBoxASPhone->Text
3108  + "', email='" + this->textBoxASEmail->Text
3109  + "' WHERE id_common_data ='" + this->relEmployersToCommonData + "'";
3110  dbDriver db;
3111  db.update(cquery);
3112 
3113  if (db.getStatus())
3114  {
3115  MessageBox::Show("Dane zostay zaktualizowane");
3116  db.closeConnection();
3117  }
3118  else
3119  {
3120  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3121  db.closeConnection();
3122  }
3123  }
3124  else if (this->textBoxASOldPassword->Text != "" && this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text != "" && this->textBoxASRNewPassword->Text != "")
3125  {
3126  String^ query = "Select count(employers.id_employers) from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON common_data.id_common_data = employers.cdata WHERE common_data.status = 1 AND employers.id_employers='" + this->userId + "' AND password=password('" + this->textBoxASOldPassword->Text + "')";
3127  dbDriver db;
3128  db.selectOne(query);
3129  if (db.getStatus())
3130  {
3131 
3132  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
3133  {
3134  db.closeConnection();
3135  if (this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text->Length > 3 && this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text->Length < 100
3136  && this->textBoxASRNewPassword->Text->Length > 3 && this->textBoxASRNewPassword->Text->Length < 100
3137  && (this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text == this->textBoxASRNewPassword->Text)
3138  )
3139  {
3140  String^ cquery = "UPDATE employers SET password=password('" + this->textBoxASNewPassword->Text
3141  + "') WHERE id_employers ='" + this->userId + "'";
3142 
3143  db.update(cquery);
3144  db.closeConnection();
3145 
3146  cquery = "UPDATE common_data SET common_data.phone='" + this->textBoxASPhone->Text
3147  + "', email='" + this->textBoxASEmail->Text + "' WHERE id_common_data ='" + this->relEmployersToCommonData + "'";
3148  db.update(cquery);
3149 
3150  if (db.getStatus())
3151  {
3152  MessageBox::Show("Dane zostay zaktualizowane");
3153  db.closeConnection();
3154  }
3155  else
3156  {
3157  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3158  db.closeConnection();
3159  }
3160  }
3161  else
3162  {
3163  db.closeConnection();
3164  MessageBox::Show("Nowe haso i potwierdzenie nowego hasa maj rne wartoci");
3165  }
3166  }
3167  else
3168  {
3169  MessageBox::Show("Podane stare haso jest nieprawidowe");
3170  db.closeConnection();
3171  }
3172  }
3173  else
3174  MessageBox::Show("Wprowadzono niepoprawne dane.");
3175  }
3176  }
3177  }

3186  private: System::Void buttonSearchClients_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3187  String^ ManyQuery = "Select clients.id_clients as id, clients.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE clients.name LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR clients.nip LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR clients.regon LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR common_data.email LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients + "%' OR common_data.phone LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients + "%' AND common_data.status = 1";
3188  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewClients);
3189  }

3191  private: System::Void dataGridViewClients_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
3192  if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0)
3193  {
3194  this->rowIdClients = Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewClients->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value);
3195  String^ query = "Select * from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data where common_data.status = 1 and clients.id_clients ='" + this->rowIdClients + "' LIMIT 1";
3196  dbDriver db;
3197  db.selectOne(query);
3198 
3199  if (db.getStatus())
3200  {
3201  this->relClientsToCommonData = db.result->GetInt32(5);
3202  this->labelClientID->Text = db.result->GetString(0);
3203  this->textBoxClientName->Text = db.result->GetString(1);
3204  this->textBoxClientNIP->Text = db.result->GetString(2);
3205  this->textBoxClientREGON->Text = db.result->GetString(3);
3206  this->textBoxClientAddress->Text = db.result->GetString(6);
3207  this->textBoxClientEmail->Text = db.result->GetString(8);
3208  this->textBoxClientPhone->Text = db.result->GetString(7);
3209  this->textBoxClientOtherInfo->Text = db.result->GetString(9);
3210  db.closeConnection();
3211  if (userType)
3212  this->buttonDeleteClient->Enabled = true;
3213  this->buttonSaveClient->Text = "Zapisz";
3214  }
3215  else
3216  {
3217  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3218  db.closeConnection();
3219  }
3220  }
3221  }

3227  private: Void clearFormClients()
3228  {
3229  this->labelClientID->Text = "#";
3230  this->textBoxClientName->Text = "";
3231  this->textBoxClientNIP->Text = "";
3232  this->textBoxClientREGON->Text = "";
3233  this->textBoxClientAddress->Text = "";
3234  this->textBoxClientEmail->Text = "";
3235  this->textBoxClientPhone->Text = "";
3236  this->textBoxClientOtherInfo->Text = "";
3237  this->buttonSaveClient->Text = "Dodaj";
3238  this->buttonDeleteClient->Enabled = false;
3239  this->rowIdClients = -1;
3240  }
3241 
3242  private: System::Void buttonSaveClient_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3243  try {
3244  if (this->textBoxClientName->Text->Length < 2) throw 1;
3245  if (this->textBoxClientName->Text->Length > 255) throw 2;
3246  if (this->textBoxClientNIP->Text->Length != 10) throw 3;
3247  if (this->textBoxClientREGON->Text->Length != 9) throw 4;
3248  if (this->textBoxClientAddress->Text->Length < 10) throw 5;
3249  if (this->textBoxClientAddress->Text->Length > 255) throw 6;
3250  if (this->textBoxClientEmail->Text->Length < 5) throw 7;
3251  if (this->textBoxClientEmail->Text->Length > 255) throw 8;
3252  if (this->textBoxClientPhone->Text->Length < 4) throw 9;
3253  if (this->textBoxClientPhone->Text->Length > 20) throw 10;
3254 
3255  if (this->rowIdClients > 0)
3256  {
3257  String^ query = "UPDATE clients SET name='" + this->textBoxClientName->Text
3258  + "', nip='" + this->textBoxClientNIP->Text
3259  + "', regon='" + this->textBoxClientREGON->Text
3260  + "' WHERE id_clients ='" + this->rowIdClients + "'";
3261  dbDriver db;
3262  db.update(query);
3263 
3264  if (db.getStatus())
3265  {
3266  db.closeConnection();
3267  String^ cquery = "UPDATE common_data SET address='" + this->textBoxClientAddress->Text
3268  + "', phone='" + this->textBoxClientPhone->Text
3269  + "', email='" + this->textBoxClientEmail->Text
3270  + "', other_info='" + this->textBoxClientOtherInfo->Text
3271  + "' WHERE id_common_data ='" + this->relClientsToCommonData + "'";
3272 
3273  db.update(cquery);
3274 
3275  if (db.getStatus())
3276  {
3277  String^ ManyQuery = "Select clients.id_clients as id , clients.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data where common_data.status = 1";
3278  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewClients);
3279  db.closeConnection();
3280  }
3281  else
3282  {
3283  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3284  db.closeConnection();
3285  }
3286  }
3287  else
3288  {
3289  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3290  db.closeConnection();
3291  }
3292 
3293  this->clearFormClients();
3294  }
3295  else
3296  {
3297  String^ cquery = "INSERT INTO common_data(address, phone, email, other_info) VALUES('"
3298  + this->textBoxClientAddress->Text + "', '"
3299  + this->textBoxClientPhone->Text + "', '"
3300  + this->textBoxClientEmail->Text + "', '"
3301  + this->textBoxClientOtherInfo->Text + "')";
3302  dbDriver db;
3303  db.insert(cquery);
3304 
3305  if (db.getStatus())
3306  {
3307  db.closeConnection();
3308  dbDriver dbs;
3309  String^ squery = "SELECT id_common_data FROM common_data WHERE address='"
3310  + this->textBoxClientAddress->Text + "'AND phone='"
3311  + this->textBoxClientPhone->Text + "'AND email='"
3312  + this->textBoxClientEmail->Text + "' AND common_data.status = 1";
3313  dbs.selectOne(squery);
3314  if (dbs.getStatus())
3315  {
3316  String^ equery = "INSERT INTO clients(name, nip, regon, cdata) VALUES('"
3317  + this->textBoxClientName->Text + "', '"
3318  + this->textBoxClientNIP->Text + "', '"
3319  + this->textBoxClientREGON->Text + "', '"
3320  + dbs.result->GetInt32(0) + "')";
3321  dbs.closeConnection();
3322  dbDriver dbi;
3323  dbi.insert(equery);
3324 
3325  if (dbi.getStatus())
3326  {
3327  String^ ManyQuery = "Select clients.id_clients as id , clients.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
3328  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewClients);
3329  }
3330  else
3331  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3332  dbi.closeConnection();
3333  }
3334  else
3335  {
3336  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3337  dbs.closeConnection();
3338  }
3339  }
3340  else
3341  {
3342  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3343  db.closeConnection();
3344  }
3345  this->clearFormClients();
3346  }
3347  }
3348  catch (int err)
3349  {
3350  String^ error;
3351  switch (err)
3352  {
3353  case 1:
3354  error = "Nazwa klienta jest za krtka: minimum 2 znaki";
3355  break;
3356  case 2:
3357  error = "Nazwa klienta jest za duga: maksymalnie 255 znakw";
3358  break;
3359  case 3:
3360  error = "NIP musi mie 10 cyfr";
3361  break;
3362  case 4:
3363  error = "REGON musi mie 9 cyfr";
3364  break;
3365  case 5:
3366  error = "Adres jest za krtki: minimum 10 znakw";
3367  break;
3368  case 6:
3369  error = "Adres jest za krtki: maksimum 255 znakw";
3370  break;
3371  case 7:
3372  error = "Email jest za krtki: minimum 5 znakw";
3373  break;
3374  case 8:
3375  error = "Email jest za dugi: maksimum 255 znakw";
3376  break;
3377  case 9:
3378  error = "Nr telefonu jest za krtki: minimum 4 znaki";
3379  break;
3380  case 10:
3381  error = "Nr telefonu jest za dugi: maksimum 20 znakw";
3382  break;
3383  default:
3384  error = "Wystpi nieznany bd.";
3385  break;
3386  }
3387  MessageBox::Show(error);
3388  }
3389  }
3390 
3391  private: System::Void buttonDeleteClient_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3392  if (this->rowIdClients > 0 && this->userType)
3393  {
3394  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun klienta?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
3395  {
3396  String^ query = "UPDATE common_data SET status = 0 FROM common_data INNER JOIN clients ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE clients.id_clients='" + this->rowIdClients + "'";
3397  dbDriver db;
3398  db.update(query);
3399 
3400  if (db.getStatus())
3401  {
3402  db.closeConnection();
3403  String^ ManyQuery = "Select clients.id_clients as id , clients.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
3404  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewClients);
3405  this->clearFormClients();
3406  MessageBox::Show("Usunito klienta");
3407  }
3408  else
3409  {
3410  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3411  db.closeConnection();
3412  }
3413  }
3414  }
3415  else
3416  {
3417  MessageBox::Show("Nie mona usun klienta");
3418  }
3419  }
3420

3430  private: System::Void buttonSearchProviders_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3431  String^ ManyQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id, providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE providers.name LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR providers.nip LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR providers.regon LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients->Text + "%' OR common_data.email LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients + "%' OR common_data.phone LIKE '%" + this->textBoxSearchClients + "%' AND common_data.status = 1";
3432  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewProviders);
3433  }
3434 
3435  private: System::Void dataGridViewProviders_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
3436  if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0)
3437  {
3438  this->rowIdProviders = Convert::ToInt32(dataGridViewProviders->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value);
3439  String^ query = "Select * from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data where providers.id_providers ='" + this->rowIdProviders + "' AND common_data.status = 1 LIMIT 1";
3440  dbDriver db;
3441  db.selectOne(query);
3442 
3443  if (db.getStatus())
3444  {
3445  this->relProvidersToCommonData = db.result->GetInt32(5);
3446  this->labelProviderIDVal->Text = db.result->GetString(0);
3447  this->textBoxProviderName->Text = db.result->GetString(1);
3448  this->textBoxProviderNIP->Text = db.result->GetString(2);
3449  this->textBoxProviderREGON->Text = db.result->GetString(3);
3450  this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text = db.result->GetString(6);
3451  this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text = db.result->GetString(8);
3452  this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text = db.result->GetString(7);
3453  this->textBoxProviderOtherInfo->Text = db.result->GetString(9);
3454 
3455  if (this->userType)
3456  this->buttonProviderDelete->Enabled = true;
3457  this->buttonProviderSave->Text = "Zapisz";
3458  }
3459  else
3460  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3461 
3462  db.closeConnection();
3463  }
3464  }
3465 
3466  private: System::Void buttonClearProviderForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3467  this->clearFormProviders();
3468  }
3469 
3470  private: Void clearFormProviders()
3471  {
3472  this->labelProviderIDVal->Text = "#";
3473  this->textBoxProviderName->Text = "";
3474  this->textBoxProviderNIP->Text = "";
3475  this->textBoxProviderREGON->Text = "";
3476  this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text = "";
3477  this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text = "";
3478  this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text = "";
3479  this->textBoxProviderOtherInfo->Text = "";
3480  this->buttonProviderSave->Text = "Dodaj";
3481  this->buttonProviderDelete->Enabled = false;
3482  this->rowIdProviders = -1;
3483  }
3484 
3485  private: System::Void buttonProviderSave_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3486  try {
3487  if (this->textBoxProviderName->Text->Length < 2) throw 1;
3488  if (this->textBoxProviderName->Text->Length > 255) throw 2;
3489  if (this->textBoxProviderNIP->Text->Length != 10) throw 3;
3490  if (this->textBoxProviderREGON->Text->Length != 9) throw 4;
3491  if (this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text->Length < 10) throw 5;
3492  if (this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text->Length > 255) throw 6;
3493  if (this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text->Length < 5) throw 7;
3494  if (this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text->Length > 255) throw 8;
3495  if (this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text->Length < 4) throw 9;
3496  if (this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text->Length > 20) throw 10;
3497 
3498  if (this->rowIdProviders > 0)
3499  {
3500  String^ query = "UPDATE providers SET name='" + this->textBoxProviderName->Text
3501  + "', nip='" + this->textBoxProviderNIP->Text
3502  + "', regon='" + this->textBoxProviderREGON->Text
3503  + "' WHERE id_providers ='" + this->rowIdProviders + "'";
3504  dbDriver db;
3505  db.update(query);
3506 
3507  if (db.getStatus())
3508  {
3509  db.closeConnection();
3510  String^ cquery = "UPDATE common_data SET address='" + this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text
3511  + "', phone='" + this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text
3512  + "', email='" + this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text
3513  + "', other_info='" + this->textBoxProviderOtherInfo->Text
3514  + "' WHERE id_common_data ='" + this->relProvidersToCommonData + "'";
3515  MessageBox::Show(cquery);
3516  db.update(cquery);
3517 
3518  if (db.getStatus())
3519  {
3520  String^ ManyQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
3521  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewProviders);
3522  db.closeConnection();
3523  }
3524  else
3525  {
3526  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3527  db.closeConnection();
3528  }
3529  }
3530  else
3531  {
3532  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3533  db.closeConnection();
3534  }
3535 
3536  this->clearFormProviders();
3537  }
3538  else
3539  {
3540  String^ cquery = "INSERT INTO common_data(address, phone, email, other_info) VALUES('"
3541  + this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text + "', '"
3542  + this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text + "', '"
3543  + this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text + "', '"
3544  + this->textBoxProviderOtherInfo->Text + "')";
3545  dbDriver db;
3546  db.insert(cquery);
3547 
3548  if (db.getStatus())
3549  {
3550  db.closeConnection();
3551  dbDriver dbs;
3552  String^ squery = "SELECT id_common_data FROM common_data WHERE address='"
3553  + this->textBoxProviderAddress->Text + "'AND phone='"
3554  + this->textBoxProviderPhone->Text + "'AND email='"
3555  + this->textBoxProviderEmail->Text + "' AND common_data.status = 1";
3556  dbs.selectOne(squery);
3557  if (dbs.getStatus())
3558  {
3559  String^ equery = "INSERT INTO providers(name, nip, regon, cdata) VALUES('"
3560  + this->textBoxProviderName->Text + "', '"
3561  + this->textBoxProviderNIP->Text + "', '"
3562  + this->textBoxProviderREGON->Text + "', '"
3563  + dbs.result->GetInt32(0) + "')";
3564  dbs.closeConnection();
3565  dbDriver dbi;
3566  dbi.insert(equery);
3567 
3568  if (dbi.getStatus())
3569  {
3570  String^ ManyQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
3571  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewProviders);
3572  }
3573  else
3574  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3575  dbi.closeConnection();
3576  }
3577  else
3578  {
3579  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3580  dbs.closeConnection();
3581  }
3582  }
3583  else
3584  {
3585  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3586  db.closeConnection();
3587  }
3588  this->clearFormProviders();
3589  }
3590  }
3591  catch (int err)
3592  {
3593  String^ error;
3594  switch (err)
3595  {
3596  case 1:
3597  error = "Nazwa klienta jest za krtka: minimum 2 znaki";
3598  break;
3599  case 2:
3600  error = "Nazwa klienta jest za duga: maksymalnie 255 znakw";
3601  break;
3602  case 3:
3603  error = "NIP musi mie 10 cyfr";
3604  break;
3605  case 4:
3606  error = "REGON musi mie 9 cyfr";
3607  break;
3608  case 5:
3609  error = "Adres jest za krtki: minimum 10 znakw";
3610  break;
3611  case 6:
3612  error = "Adres jest za krtki: maksimum 255 znakw";
3613  break;
3614  case 7:
3615  error = "Email jest za krtki: minimum 5 znakw";
3616  break;
3617  case 8:
3618  error = "Email jest za dugi: maksimum 255 znakw";
3619  break;
3620  case 9:
3621  error = "Nr telefonu jest za krtki: minimum 4 znaki";
3622  break;
3623  case 10:
3624  error = "Nr telefonu jest za dugi: maksimum 20 znakw";
3625  break;
3626  default:
3627  error = "Wystpi nieznany bd.";
3628  break;
3629  }
3630  MessageBox::Show(error);
3631  }
3632  }
3633 
3634  private: System::Void buttonProviderDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3635  if (this->rowIdProviders > 0 && this->userType)
3636  {
3637  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun dostawce?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
3638  {
3639  String^ query = "UPDATE common_data SET status = 0 FROM common_data INNER JOIN providers ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE providers.id_providers ='" + this->rowIdProviders + "'";
3640  dbDriver db;
3641  db.update(query);
3642 
3643  if (db.getStatus())
3644  {
3645  db.closeConnection();
3646  String^ ManyQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
3647  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewProviders);
3648  this->clearFormProviders();
3649  MessageBox::Show("Usunito dostawce");
3650  }
3651  else
3652  {
3653  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3654  db.closeConnection();
3655  }
3656  }
3657  }
3658  else
3659  {
3660  MessageBox::Show("Nie mona usun dostawcy");
3661  }
3662  }
3663 
3664  /* providers end */
3665 
3666  /* items*/
3667  private: System::Void buttonItemsShow_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3668  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
3669  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewItems);
3670 
3671  String^ ParamsQuery = "Select name as Parametry from features";
3672  this->bindTable(ParamsQuery, this->dataGridViewParams);
3673 
3674  String^ ProducersQuery = "Select name as Producenci from producers";
3675  this->bindTable(ProducersQuery, this->dataGridViewProducers);
3676  }
3677 
3678  private: System::Void buttonItemsSearch_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3679  String^ ManyQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers WHERE items.name LIKE '%" + this->textBoxItemsSearch->Text + "%' OR items.model LIKE '%" + this->textBoxItemsSearch->Text + "%' OR producers.name LIKE '%" + this->textBoxItemsSearch->Text + "%'";
3680  this->bindTable(ManyQuery, this->dataGridViewItems);
3681  }
3682 
3683  private: System::Void dataGridViewItems_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
3684 
3685  if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0)
3686  {
3687  this->rowIdItems = Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value);
3688 
3689  String^ ParamsQuery = "Select features.name as Parametr, products_features.value as 'Warto' from features INNER JOIN products_features ON products_features.id_features = features.id_features INNER JOIN items ON products_features.id_items = items.id_items WHERE products_features.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3690  this->bindTable(ParamsQuery, this->dataGridViewParams);
3691 
3692  String^ ProducersQuery = "Select producers.name as Producenci from producers INNER JOIN items ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers WHERE items.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3693  this->bindTable(ProducersQuery, this->dataGridViewProducers);
3694 
3695  String^ query = "Select * FROM items WHERE id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3696  dbDriver db;
3697  db.selectOne(query);
3698 
3699  if (db.getStatus())
3700  {
3701  this->labelItemIDVal->Text = db.result->GetString(0);
3702  this->textBoxItemName->Text = db.result->GetString(1);
3703  this->textBoxItemModel->Text = db.result->GetString(2);
3704  this->labelItemQuantityVal->Text = db.result->GetString(3);
3705  this->TextBoxItemPrice->Text = db.result->GetDecimal("price").ToString("00000.00");
3706 
3707  if (userType)
3708  this->buttonItemDelete->Enabled = true;
3709  this->buttonItemSave->Text = "Zapisz";
3710  this->labelItemParam->Visible = true;
3711  this->comboBoxItemParam->Visible = true;
3712  this->textBoxItemParamVal->Visible = true;
3713  this->labelItemProducer->Visible = true;
3714  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Visible = true;
3715  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Visible = true;
3716  this->buttonItemParamAdd->Visible = true;
3717  this->buttonItemProducerAdd->Visible = true;
3718  this->comboBoxItemParam->Items->Clear();
3719  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Items->Clear();
3720  this->comboBoxItemParam->Text = "Dodaj nowy";
3721  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text = "Dodaj nowy";
3722  this->buttonItemClearForm->Enabled = true;
3723  this->buttonItemParamHelp->Visible = true;
3724  this->buttonItemParamDelete->Visible = true;
3725  this->buttonItemParamHelp->Visible = true;
3726  this->buttonItemProducerDelete->Visible = true;
3727  this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text = "";
3728  this->buttonItemProducerHelp->Visible = true;
3729 
3730  String^ ParamsQueryToBox = "Select features.name as Parametry, products_features.value as 'Warto' from features INNER JOIN products_features ON products_features.id_features = features.id_features INNER JOIN items ON products_features.id_items = items.id_items";
3731  dbDriver db;
3732  db.selectOne(ParamsQueryToBox);
3733  if (db.getStatus())
3734  {
3735  while(db.result->Read())
3736  this->comboBoxItemParam->Items->Add(db.result->GetString(0));
3737 
3738  String^ ProducerQueryToBox = "Select producers.name FROM producers INNER JOIN items ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers WHERE items.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3739  dbDriver dbp;
3740  dbp.selectOne(ProducerQueryToBox);
3741  if (dbp.getStatus())
3742  {
3743  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text = dbp.result->GetString(0);
3744  String^ AllProducerQueryToBox = "Select name From producers";
3745  dbDriver dbpa;
3746  dbpa.selectOne(AllProducerQueryToBox);
3747  if (dbpa.getStatus())
3748  {
3749  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Items->Add(dbpa.result->GetString(0));
3750  while (dbpa.result->Read())
3751  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Items->Add(dbpa.result->GetString(0));
3752  }
3753  else
3754  MessageBox::Show(dbp.getError());
3755  dbpa.closeConnection();
3756  }
3757  else
3758  MessageBox::Show(dbp.getError());
3759  dbp.closeConnection();
3760  }
3761  else
3762  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3763  db.closeConnection();
3764 
3765  }
3766  else
3767  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3768 
3769  db.closeConnection();
3770 
3771  }
3772  }
3773 
3774  private: System::Void comboBoxItemParam_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3775  this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text = "";
3776  String^ query = "SELECT products_features.value FROM products_features INNER JOIN features ON products_features.id_features = features.id_features WHERE products_features.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems +
3777  "' AND products_features.id_features=(SELECT features.id_features FROM features WHERE features.name='" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "')";
3778  dbDriver db;
3779  db.selectOne(query);
3780  if (db.getStatus())
3781  {
3782  this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text = db.result->GetString(0);
3783  }
3784  else
3785  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3786  db.closeConnection();
3787  }
3788 
3789  private: System::Void buttonItemClearForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3790  this->clearItemForm();
3791  }
3792 
3793  private: Void clearItemForm()
3794  {
3795  this->rowIdItems = -1;
3796  this->labelItemIDVal->Text = "#";
3797  this->textBoxItemName->Text = "";
3798  this->textBoxItemModel->Text = "";
3799  this->labelItemQuantityVal->Text = "";
3800  this->TextBoxItemPrice->Text = "";
3801  this->buttonItemDelete->Enabled = false;
3802  this->buttonItemSave->Text = "Dodaj";
3803  this->labelItemParam->Visible = false;
3804  this->comboBoxItemParam->Visible = false;
3805  this->textBoxItemParamVal->Visible = false;
3806  this->labelItemProducer->Visible = false;
3807  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Visible = false;
3808  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Visible = false;
3809  this->buttonItemParamAdd->Visible = false;
3810  this->buttonItemProducerAdd->Visible = false;
3811  this->comboBoxItemParam->Items->Clear();
3812  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Items->Clear();
3813  this->comboBoxItemParam->Text = "Dodaj nowy";
3814  this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text = "Dodaj nowy";
3815  this->buttonItemClearForm->Enabled = false;
3816  this->buttonItemParamHelp->Visible = false;
3817  this->buttonItemParamDelete->Visible = false;
3818  this->buttonItemParamHelp->Visible = false;
3819  this->buttonItemProducerDelete->Visible = false;
3820  this->buttonItemParamHelp->Visible = false;
3821  }
3822 
3823  private: System::Void buttonItemSave_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3824  try {
3825  String^ price = this->TextBoxItemPrice->Text->Replace(",", ".");
3826  if (this->textBoxItemName->Text->Length < 2) throw 1;
3827  if (this->textBoxItemName->Text->Length > 255) throw 2;
3828  if (this->textBoxItemModel->Text->Length < 2) throw 3;
3829  if (this->textBoxItemModel->Text->Length > 255) throw 4;
3830 
3831  if (this->rowIdItems > 0)
3832  {
3833  String^ query = "UPDATE items SET name='" + this->textBoxItemName->Text + "', model='" + this->textBoxItemModel->Text + "', price='" + price + "' WHERE id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3834  dbDriver db;
3835  db.update(query); MessageBox::Show(query);
3836  if (!db.getStatus())
3837  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3838  else
3839  MessageBox::Show("Dane przedmiotu zostay zaktualizowane");
3840  db.closeConnection();
3841  this->clearItemForm();
3842  }
3843  else
3844  {
3845  String^ query = "INSERT INTO items(name, model, price, id_producers) VALUES('" + this->textBoxItemName->Text + "','" + this->textBoxItemModel->Text + "','" + price + "', '1')";
3846  dbDriver db;
3847  db.insert(query);
3848  if (!db.getStatus())
3849  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3850  else
3851  MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta dodany");
3852  db.closeConnection();
3853  this->clearItemForm();
3854  }
3855 
3856  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price AS Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
3857  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewItems);
3858 
3859  String^ ParamsQuery = "Select name as Parametry from features";
3860  this->bindTable(ParamsQuery, this->dataGridViewParams);
3861 
3862  String^ ProducersQuery = "Select name as Producenci from producers";
3863  this->bindTable(ProducersQuery, this->dataGridViewProducers);
3864 
3865  }
3866  catch (int ex)
3867  {
3868  if (ex == 1)
3869  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa przedmiotu powinna mie przynajmniej 2 znaki");
3870  if (ex == 2)
3871  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa przedmiotu powinna mie najwicej 255 znakw");
3872  if (ex == 3)
3873  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa modelu powinna mie przynajmniej 2 znaki");
3874  if (ex == 4)
3875  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa modelu powinna mie najwicej 255 znakw");
3876  }
3877  }
3878 
3879  private: System::Void buttonItemParamAdd_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3880  try {
3881  if (this->comboBoxItemParam->Text->Length < 2) throw 1;
3882  if (this->comboBoxItemParam->Text->Length > 255) throw 2;
3883  if (this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text->Length == 0) throw 4;
3884  if (this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text->Length > 255) throw 5;
3885  String^ query = "SELECT count(id_features) AS ct, id_features FROM features WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "'";
3886  dbDriver db;
3887  db.selectOne(query);
3888  if (!db.getStatus()) {
3889  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3890  throw 0;
3891  }
3892  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
3893  {
3894  int id_features = db.result->GetInt32(1);
3895  db.closeConnection();
3896 
3897  String^ squery = "SELECT count(id_items) as ct FROM products_features WHERE id_features='" + id_features + "' AND id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3898  dbDriver dbs;
3899  dbs.selectOne(squery);
3900  if (!dbs.getStatus()) {
3901  MessageBox::Show(dbs.getError());
3902  throw 0;
3903  }
3904  if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
3905  {
3906  String^ uquery = "UPDATE products_features INNER JOIN features ON products_features.id_features = features.id_features SET products_features.value='" + this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text + "' WHERE products_features.id_features='" + id_features + "' AND products_features.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
3907  dbDriver dbu;
3908  dbu.update(uquery);
3909  if (!dbu.getStatus()) {
3910  MessageBox::Show(dbu.getError());
3911  }
3912  else
3913  MessageBox::Show("Zaktualizowano warto parametru");
3914  dbu.closeConnection();
3915  }
3916  else if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 0)
3917  {
3918  String^ iquery = "INSERT INTO products_features(id_items, id_features, value) VALUES('" + this->rowIdItems + "', '" + id_features + "', '" + this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text + "')";
3919  dbDriver dbi;
3920  dbi.update(iquery);
3921  if (!dbi.getStatus()) {
3922  MessageBox::Show(dbi.getError());
3923  }
3924  else
3925  MessageBox::Show("Dodano parametr do przedmiotu");
3926  dbi.closeConnection();
3927  }
3928  else
3929  throw 3;
3930  dbs.closeConnection();
3931  }
3932  else if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 0)
3933  {
3934  db.closeConnection();
3935  String^ iquery = "INSERT INTO features(name) VALUES('" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "')";
3936  dbDriver dbi;
3937  dbi.insert(iquery);
3938  if (!dbi.getStatus()) {
3939  MessageBox::Show(dbi.getError());
3940  dbi.closeConnection();
3941  }
3942  else
3943  {
3944  dbi.closeConnection();
3945  String^ iiquery = "INSERT INTO products_features(id_items, id_features, value) VALUES('" + this->rowIdItems + "', (SELECT id_features FROM features WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "'), '" + this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text + "')";
3946  dbDriver dbii;
3947  dbii.insert(iiquery);
3948  if (!dbii.getStatus())
3949  {
3950  MessageBox::Show(dbii.getError());
3951  }
3952  else
3953  MessageBox::Show("Parametr zosta dodany");
3954  dbii.closeConnection();
3955  }
3956  }
3957  else
3958  throw 3;
3959  }
3960  catch (int ex)
3961  {
3962  if (ex == 1)
3963  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa parametru powinna mie przynajmniej 2 znaki");
3964  if (ex == 2)
3965  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa parametru powinna mie najwicej 255 znakw");
3966  if (ex == 3)
3967  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa parametru jest niepoprawna");
3968  if (ex == 4)
3969  MessageBox::Show("Warto parametru nie moe by pusta");
3970  if (ex == 4)
3971  MessageBox::Show("Dugo wartoci parametru powinna mie najwicej 255 znakw");
3972  }
3973  }
3974 
3975  private: System::Void buttonItemParamDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
3976  if (this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text == "")
3977  {
3978  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz na stae usun parametr?\n Zostanie on usunity ze wszystkich przedmiotw w magazynie!", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
3979  {
3980  String^ query = "DELETE features, products_features FROM features INNER JOIN products_features ON products_features.id_features = features.id_features WHERE features.name='" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "'";
3981  dbDriver db;
3982  db.deleteFromSql(query);
3983  if (db.getStatus())
3984  {
3985  MessageBox::Show("Parametr zosta usunity ze wszystkich przedmiotw w magazynie");
3986  }
3987  else
3988  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
3989  db.closeConnection();
3990 
3991  }
3992  }
3993  else if(this->textBoxItemParamVal->Text != "")
3994  {
3995  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz na stae usun parametr z przedmiotu?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
3996  {
3997  String^ query = "DELETE FROM products_features WHERE products_features.id_features=(SELECT id_features FROM features WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemParam->Text + "')";
3998  dbDriver db;
3999  db.deleteFromSql(query);
4000  if (db.getStatus())
4001  {
4002  MessageBox::Show("Parametr zosta usunity z przedmiotu");
4003  }
4004  else
4005  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4006  db.closeConnection();
4007 
4008  }
4009  }
4010  }
4011 
4012  private: System::Void buttonItemProducerAdd_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4013  try
4014  {
4015  if (this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text->Length < 2) throw 1;
4016  if (this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text->Length > 255) throw 2;
4017  String^ query = "SELECT count(id_producers), id_producers FROM producers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "'";
4018  dbDriver db;
4019  db.selectOne(query);
4020  if (!db.getStatus())
4021  {
4022  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4023  }
4024 
4025  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
4026  {
4027  db.closeConnection();
4028  String^ uquery = "UPDATE items SET id_producers=(SELECT id_producers FROM producers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "') WHERE id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
4029  dbDriver db;
4030  db.update(uquery);
4031  if (!db.getStatus()) {
4032  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4033  }
4034  else
4035  MessageBox::Show("Zaktualizowano producenta");
4036  db.closeConnection();
4037 
4038  }
4039  else if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 0)
4040  {
4041  db.closeConnection();
4042  String^ upquery = "INSERT INTO producers(name) VALUES('" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "')";
4043  dbDriver dbup;
4044  dbup.insert(upquery);
4045  if (!dbup.getStatus())
4046  {
4047  MessageBox::Show(dbup.getError());
4048  dbup.closeConnection();
4049  }
4050  else
4051  {
4052  dbup.closeConnection();
4053  String^ uquery = "UPDATE items SET id_producers=(SELECT id_producers FROM producers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "') WHERE id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
4054  dbDriver dbu;
4055  dbu.update(uquery);
4056  if (!dbu.getStatus()) {
4057  MessageBox::Show(dbu.getError());
4058  }
4059  else
4060  MessageBox::Show("Zaktualizowano producenta");
4061  dbu.closeConnection();
4062  }
4063  }
4064  else
4065  {
4066  db.closeConnection();
4067  throw 3;
4068  }
4069  }
4070  catch (int ex)
4071  {
4072  if (ex == 1)
4073  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa producenta powinna mie przynajmniej 2 znaki");
4074  if (ex == 2)
4075  MessageBox::Show("Nazwa producenta powinna mie najwicej 255 znakw");
4076  if (ex == 3)
4077  MessageBox::Show("Wystpi nieznany bd");
4078  }
4079  }
4080 
4081  private: System::Void buttonItemProducerDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4082  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz na stae usun producenta?\n Zostanie on usunity ze wszystkich przedmiotw w magazynie!", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
4083  {
4084  String^ uquery = "UPDATE items SET id_producers=1 WHERE id_producers=(SELECT id_producers FROM producers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "')";
4085  dbDriver dbu;
4086  dbu.update(uquery);
4087  if (dbu.getStatus())
4088  {
4089  String^ query = "DELETE FROM producers WHERE name ='" + this->comboBoxItemProducer->Text + "'";
4090  dbDriver db;
4091  db.deleteFromSql(query);
4092  if (db.getStatus())
4093  {
4094  MessageBox::Show("Parametr zosta usunity ze wszystkich przedmiotw w magazynie");
4095  }
4096  else
4097  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4098  db.closeConnection();
4099  }
4100  else
4101  MessageBox::Show(dbu.getError());
4102  dbu.closeConnection();
4103  }
4104  }
4105 
4106  private: System::Void buttonItemDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4107  if (this->userType)
4108  {
4109  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz na stae usun przedmiot?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
4110  {
4111  String^ query = "DELETE items, products_features FROM items INNER JOIN products_features ON products_features.id_items = items.id_items WHERE items.id_items='" + this->rowIdItems + "'";
4112 
4113  dbDriver db;
4114  db.deleteFromSql(query);
4115  if (db.getStatus())
4116  {
4117  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
4118  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewItems);
4119 
4120  String^ ParamsQuery = "Select name as Parametry from features";
4121  this->bindTable(ParamsQuery, this->dataGridViewParams);
4122 
4123  String^ ProducersQuery = "Select name as Producenci from producers";
4124  this->bindTable(ProducersQuery, this->dataGridViewProducers);
4125  this->clearItemForm();
4126  MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta usunity z bazy dancyh");
4127  }
4128  else
4129  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4130  db.closeConnection();
4131  }
4132  }
4133  }
