4407  private: System::Void buttonSalesClose_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4408  String^ query = "UPDATE sales SET status = 1, price=(SELECT SUM(sales_items.quantity*items.price) from sales_items INNER JOIN items ON sales_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE sales_items.id_sales = '" + this->rowIdSales + "') WHERE id_sales = '" + this->rowIdSales + "'";
4409  dbDriver db;
4410  db.update(query);
4411  if (db.getStatus())
4412  {
4413  MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa zamknita");
4414  this->labelSellItem->Enabled = false;
4415  this->comboBoxSellItem->Enabled = false;
4416  this->labelSellQuantity->Enabled = false;
4417  this->maskedTextBoxSellQuantity->Enabled = false;
4418  this->buttonSalesAddItem->Enabled = false;
4419  this->buttonSalesDeleteItem->Enabled = false;
4420  this->buttonSalesClose->Enabled = false;
4421  }
4422  else
4423  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4424  db.closeConnection();
4425  }
4426 
4427  private: System::Void buttonSalesDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4428  String^ query = "Select status, count(sales_items.id_sales) from sales INNER JOIN sales_items ON sales.id_sales = sales_items.id_sales where sales.id_sales='" + this->rowIdSales + "'";
4429  dbDriver db;
4430  db.selectOne(query);
4431  if (db.getStatus())
4432  {
4433  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
4434  {
4435  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun transakcje?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
4436  {
4437  String^ dquery;
4438  if(db.result->GetInt32(1) > 0)
4439  dquery = "DELETE sales, sales_items FROM sales_items INNER JOIN sales ON sales_items.id_sales = sales.id_sales WHERE sales.id_sales = '" + this->rowIdSales + "'";
4440  else if(db.result->GetInt32(1) == 0)
4441  dquery = "DELETE FROM sales WHERE id_sales = '" + this->rowIdSales + "'";
4442  dbDriver dbd;
4443  dbd.deleteFromSql(dquery);
4444  if (dbd.getStatus())
4445  {
4446  MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa usunita");
4447  String^ SalesQuery = "SELECT id_sales as Id_sprzedazy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_clients as Id_klienta, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from sales";
4448  this->bindTable(SalesQuery, this->dataGridViewSales);
4449 
4450  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
4451  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewSalesItems);
4452 
4453  String^ ClientsQuery = "Select clients.id_clients as id , clients.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from clients INNER JOIN common_data ON clients.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
4454  this->bindTable(ClientsQuery, this->dataGridViewSalesClients);
4455 
4456  String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1";
4457  this->bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewSalesEmployers);
4458  this->clearFormSales();
4459  }
4460  else
4461  MessageBox::Show(dbd.getError());
4462  dbd.closeConnection();
4463  }
4464  }
4465  else
4466  MessageBox::Show("Musisz zamkn transakcje przed usuniciem");
4467  }
4468  else
4469  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4470  db.closeConnection();
4471  }

4473  private: System::Void buttonSalesClearForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4474  this->clearFormSales();
4475  }

4477  private: Void clearFormSales(){
4478  this->labelSellIDVal->Text = "#";
4479  this->comboBoxSellClient->Enabled = true;
4480  this->rowIdSales = -1;
4481  this->maskedTextBoxSellQuantity->Text = "";
4482  this->buttonSalesSave->Enabled = true;
4483  this->comboBoxSellItem->Items->Clear();
4484  this->comboBoxSellItem->Enabled = false;
4485  this->maskedTextBoxSellQuantity->Enabled = false;
4486  this->buttonSalesAddItem->Enabled = false;
4487  this->buttonSalesDeleteItem->Enabled = false;
4488  this->buttonSalesClose->Enabled = false;
4489  this->buttonSalesDelete->Enabled = false;
4490  this->buttonSalesClearForm->Enabled = false;
4491  }

4495  {
4496  String^ Query = "SELECT sales.id_sales as Id_sprzedazy, sales.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, sales.id_clients as Id_klienta, sales.date as Data, sales.price as Kwota_transakcji, sales.status from sales WHERE sales.id_clients = '" + this->dataGridViewSalesClients->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'";

4506  private: System::Void buttonSalesHelp_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4507  MessageBox::Show(
4508  "Sprzeda - Instrukcja obsugi\n"
4509  + "Wybierz klienta z listy a nastpnie nacinij Dodaj transakcje\n"
4510  + "Po dodaniu transakcji moesz dodawa do niej przedmioty i okrela ich ilo oraz je usuwa␀n" + "Aby usun ca transakcje naley j wczeniej zamkn\n" + "Po zakmniciu transakcji nie ma moliwo dodawania do niej przedmiotw\n" ); } /* Deliveries */ private: System::Void buttonDeliveryShow_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->rowIdDelivery = -1; String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers); } private: System::Void buttonDeliverySave_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "INSERT INTO provides(id_employers, id_providers, date) VALUES ('" + this->userId + "', (SELECT id_providers FROM providers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text + "'), now())"; dbDriver db; db.insert(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa dodana przejd do jej konfiguracji"); String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides WHERE id_employers='" + this->userId + "' ORDER BY id_provides DESC Limit 1"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, dataGridViewDelivery); this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows->Clear(); this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows->Clear(); this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->Rows->Clear(); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void dataGridViewDelivery_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0) { this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = true; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = ""; this->rowIdDelivery = Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides='" + rowIdDelivery + "'"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE providers.id_providers='" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu as NrTelefonu from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE employers.id_employers = '" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers); if (Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[5]->Value) == 1) { this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString(); this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[0]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString(); this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = true; } else if (Convert::ToInt32(dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[5]->Value) == 0) { this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString(); this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[0]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString(); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = true; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = true; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true; this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true; this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = true; this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = false; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = true; this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = true; this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = true; String^ query = "Select concat(name, ' ', model) FROM items"; dbDriver db; db.selectOne(query); if (db.getStatus()) { this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Clear(); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Add(db.result->GetString(0)); while (db.result->Read()) this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Add(db.result->GetString(0)); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } } private: System::Void comboBoxDeliveryProvider_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = true; } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryAddItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { try { if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) <= 0) throw 1; if (this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text == "") throw 2; String^ squery = "SELECT count(provides_items.id_provides), provides_items.id_items, provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items inner join items on provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver dbs; dbs.selectOne(squery); if (dbs.getStatus()) { if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 1) { String^ query = "UPDATE provides_items SET quantity = '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "' WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "' AND id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'"; dbDriver db; db.update(query); if (db.getStatus()) { String^ qquery; if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) >= dbs.result->GetInt32(2)) { qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=(quantity + ('" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "'-'" + dbs.result->GetInt32(2) + "')) WHERE id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'"; } else if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) < dbs.result->GetInt32(2)) { qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=(quantity - ('" + dbs.result->GetInt32(2) + "'-'" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "')) WHERE id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'"; } dbDriver ddb; ddb.update(qquery); if (ddb.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta zaktualizowany"); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides ='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); } else MessageBox::Show(ddb.getError()); ddb.closeConnection(); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } else if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 0) { String^ query = "INSERT INTO provides_items(id_provides, id_items, quantity) VALUES('" + this->rowIdDelivery + "', (SELECT id_items from items WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'), '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "')"; dbDriver db; db.insert(query); if (db.getStatus()) { String^ qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=quantity + '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "' WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver ddb; ddb.update(qquery); if (ddb.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot dodany"); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); } else MessageBox::Show(ddb.getError()); ddb.closeConnection(); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } else { MessageBox::Show(dbs.getError()); dbs.closeConnection(); } } catch (int ex) { if (ex == 1) MessageBox::Show("Ilo dostarczonego przedmiotu musi by wiksza od 0"); if (ex == 2) MessageBox::Show("Wybierz przedmiot ktry jest dostarczony"); } } private: System::Void comboBoxDeliveryItem_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = true; String^ query = "SELECT count(provides_items.id_provides), provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items inner join items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver db; db.selectOne(query); if (db.getStatus()) { if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1) { this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = db.result->GetString(1); this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = true; } } else { MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDeleteItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun przedmiot z transakcji?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes) { String^ qquery = "SELECT provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "' and provides_items.id_provides= '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver dbqq; dbqq.selectOne(qquery); if (dbqq.getStatus()) { String^ query = "DELETE provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "' and provides_items.id_items=(SELECT id_items from items where concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "')"; dbDriver db; db.deleteFromSql(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta usunity z transakcji"); String^ qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity = quantity - '" + dbqq.result->GetString(0) + "' WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver dbq; dbq.update(qquery); if (dbq.getStatus()) { String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides ='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); } else MessageBox::Show(dbq.getError()); dbq.closeConnection(); } else { MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } else MessageBox::Show(dbqq.getError()); dbqq.closeConnection(); } } private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryItems_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (this->rowIdDelivery >= 0) { this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString() + " " + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value->ToString(); this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[4]->Value->ToString(); } else { String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_klienta, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides= provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_items = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); } } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClose_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "UPDATE provides SET status = 1, price=(SELECT SUM(provides_items.quantity*items.price) from provides_items INNER JOIN items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "') WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver db; db.update(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa zamknita"); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false; } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "Select status, count(provides_items.id_provides) from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides where provides.id_provides='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver db; db.selectOne(query); if (db.getStatus()) { if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1) { if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun transakcje?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes) { String^ dquery; if (db.result->GetInt32(1) > 0) dquery = "DELETE provides, provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN provides ON provides_items.id_provides = provides.id_provides WHERE provides.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; else if (db.result->GetInt32(1) == 0) dquery = "DELETE FROM provides WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver dbd; dbd.deleteFromSql(dquery); if (dbd.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa usunita"); String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_klienta, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data"; bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers); this->clearFormDelivery(); } else MessageBox::Show(dbd.getError()); dbd.closeConnection(); } } else MessageBox::Show("Musisz zamkn transakcje przed usuniciem"); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClearForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->clearFormDelivery(); } private: Void clearFormDelivery() { this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = "#"; this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = true; this->rowIdDelivery = -1; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = ""; this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = true; this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Clear(); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = false; } private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryProviders_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (this->rowIdDelivery < 0) { String^ Query = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_dostawcy, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides WHERE provides.id_providers = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'"; } }; } \n"
4511  + "Aby usun ca transakcje naley j wczeniej zamkn␀n" + "Po zakmniciu transakcji nie ma moliwo dodawania do niej przedmiotw\n" ); } /* Deliveries */ private: System::Void buttonDeliveryShow_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->rowIdDelivery = -1; String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers); } private: System::Void buttonDeliverySave_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "INSERT INTO provides(id_employers, id_providers, date) VALUES ('" + this->userId + "', (SELECT id_providers FROM providers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text + "'), now())"; dbDriver db; db.insert(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa dodana przejd do jej konfiguracji"); String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides WHERE id_employers='" + this->userId + "' ORDER BY id_provides DESC Limit 1"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, dataGridViewDelivery); this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->DataSource = nullptr; this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows->Clear(); this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows->Clear(); this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->Rows->Clear(); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void dataGridViewDelivery_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0) { this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = true; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE providers.id_providers='" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu as NrTelefonu from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE employers.id_employers = '" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1"; } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryAddItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { try { if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) <= 0) throw 1; if (this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text == "") throw 2; String^ squery = "SELECT count(provides_items.id_provides), provides_items.id_items, provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items inner join items on provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver db; db.selectOne(query); if (db.getStatus()) { if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1) { this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = db.result->GetString(1); this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = true; } } else { MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDeleteItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun przedmiot z transakcji?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes) { String^ qquery = "SELECT provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "' and provides_items.id_provides= '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver dbqq; dbqq.selectOne(qquery); if (dbqq.getStatus()) { String^ query = "DELETE provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "' and provides_items.id_items=(SELECT id_items from items where concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "')"; dbDriver db; db.deleteFromSql(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta usunity z transakcji"); String^ qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity = quantity - '" + dbqq.result->GetString(0) + "' WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'"; dbDriver dbq; dbq.update(qquery); if (dbq.getStatus()) { String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides ='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); } else MessageBox::Show(dbq.getError()); dbq.closeConnection(); } else { MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } } else MessageBox::Show(dbqq.getError()); dbqq.closeConnection(); } } private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryItems_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (this->rowIdDelivery >= 0) { this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString() + " " + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value->ToString(); this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[4]->Value->ToString(); } else { String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_klienta, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides= provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_items = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); } } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClose_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "UPDATE provides SET status = 1, price=(SELECT SUM(provides_items.quantity*items.price) from provides_items INNER JOIN items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "') WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver db; db.update(query); if (db.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa zamknita"); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false; } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { String^ query = "Select status, count(provides_items.id_provides) from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides where provides.id_provides='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver db; db.selectOne(query); if (db.getStatus()) { if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1) { if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun transakcje?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes) { String^ dquery; if (db.result->GetInt32(1) > 0) dquery = "DELETE provides, provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN provides ON provides_items.id_provides = provides.id_provides WHERE provides.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; else if (db.result->GetInt32(1) == 0) dquery = "DELETE FROM provides WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'"; dbDriver dbd; dbd.deleteFromSql(dquery); if (dbd.getStatus()) { MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa usunita"); String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_klienta, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides"; this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery); String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers"; this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems); String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data"; this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders); String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data"; bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers); this->clearFormDelivery(); } else MessageBox::Show(dbd.getError()); dbd.closeConnection(); } } else MessageBox::Show("Musisz zamkn transakcje przed usuniciem"); } else MessageBox::Show(db.getError()); db.closeConnection(); } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClearForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { this->clearFormDelivery(); } private: Void clearFormDelivery() { this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = "#"; this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = true; this->rowIdDelivery = -1; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = ""; this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = true; this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Clear(); this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false; this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = false; this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = false; } private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryProviders_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (this->rowIdDelivery < 0) { String^ Query = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_dostawcy, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides WHERE provides.id_providers = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'"; this->bindTable(Query, this->dataGridViewDelivery); } } private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) { if (this->rowIdDelivery < 0) { String^ Query = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_dostawcy, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides WHERE provides.id_employers = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'"; this->bindTable(Query, this->dataGridViewDelivery); } } private: System::Void buttonDeliveryHelp_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) { MessageBox::Show( "Dostawa - Instrukcja obsugi\n" + "Wybierz dostawce z listy a nastpnie nacinij Dodaj transakcje\n" + "Po dodaniu transakcji moesz dodawa do niej przedmioty i okrela ich ilo oraz je usuwa\n" + "Aby usun ca transakcje naley j wczeniej zamkn\n" + "Po zakmniciu transakcji nie ma moliwo dodawania do niej przedmiotw\n" ); } }; } \n"

4520  String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides";
4521  this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery);
4522 
4523  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
4524  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4525

4527  this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders);

4533  private: System::Void buttonDeliverySave_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4534  String^ query = "INSERT INTO provides(id_employers, id_providers, date) VALUES ('" + this->userId + "', (SELECT id_providers FROM providers WHERE name='" + this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text + "'), now())";
4535  dbDriver db;
4536  db.insert(query);
4537  if (db.getStatus())
4538  {
4539  MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa dodana przejd do jej konfiguracji");
4540  String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_dostawcy, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides WHERE id_employers='" + this->userId + "' ORDER BY id_provides DESC Limit 1";
4541  this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, dataGridViewDelivery);
4542  this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->DataSource = nullptr;
4543  this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->DataSource = nullptr;
4544  this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->DataSource = nullptr;
4545  this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows->Clear();
4546  this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows->Clear();
4547  this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->Rows->Clear();
4548  }
4549  else
4550  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4551  db.closeConnection();
4552  }

4554  private: System::Void dataGridViewDelivery_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
4555  if (Convert::ToInt32(e->RowIndex) >= 0)
4556  {
4557  this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = true;
4558  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = "";
4559  this->rowIdDelivery = Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value);
4560  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides='" + rowIdDelivery + "'";
4561  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4562 
4563  String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE providers.id_providers='" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1";
4564  this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders);
4565 
4566  String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu as NrTelefonu from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data WHERE employers.id_employers = '" + this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value + "' AND common_data.status = 1";
4567  this->bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers);
4568 
4569  if (Convert::ToInt32(this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[5]->Value) == 1)
4570  {
4571  this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString();
4572  this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[0]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString();
4573  this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = false;
4574  this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = true;
4575 
4576  }
4577  else if (Convert::ToInt32(dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[5]->Value) == 0)
4578  {
4579  this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = this->dataGridViewDelivery->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString();
4580  this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[0]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString();
4581  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = true;
4582  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = true;
4583  this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true;
4584  this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true;
4585  this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = false;
4586  this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = true;
4587  this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = true;
4588  this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = false;
4589  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = true;
4590  this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = true;
4591  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = true;
4592 
4593  String^ query = "Select concat(name, ' ', model) FROM items";
4594  dbDriver db;
4595  db.selectOne(query);
4596  if (db.getStatus())
4597  {
4598  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Clear();
4599  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Add(db.result->GetString(0));
4600  while (db.result->Read())
4601  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Add(db.result->GetString(0));
4602  }
4603  else
4604  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4605  db.closeConnection();
4606  }
4607  }
4608  }

4610  private: System::Void comboBoxDeliveryProvider_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4611  this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = true;
4612  }
4613 
4614  private: System::Void buttonDeliveryAddItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4615  try {
4616  if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) <= 0) throw 1;
4617  if (this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text == "") throw 2;
4618 
4619  String^ squery = "SELECT count(provides_items.id_provides), provides_items.id_items, provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items inner join items on provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'";
4620  dbDriver dbs;
4621  dbs.selectOne(squery);
4622  if (dbs.getStatus())
4623  {
4624  if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
4625  {
4626  String^ query = "UPDATE provides_items SET quantity = '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "' WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "' AND id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'";
4627  dbDriver db;
4628  db.update(query);
4629  if (db.getStatus())
4630  {
4631  String^ qquery;
4632  if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) >= dbs.result->GetInt32(2))
4633  {
4634  qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=(quantity + ('" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "'-'" + dbs.result->GetInt32(2) + "')) WHERE id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'";
4635  }
4636  else if (Convert::ToInt32(this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text) < dbs.result->GetInt32(2))
4637  {
4638  qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=(quantity - ('" + dbs.result->GetInt32(2) + "'-'" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "')) WHERE id_items='" + dbs.result->GetInt32(1) + "'";
4639  }
4640 
4641  dbDriver ddb;
4642  ddb.update(qquery);
4643  if (ddb.getStatus())
4644  {
4645  MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta zaktualizowany");
4646  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides ='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4647  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4648  }
4649  else
4650  MessageBox::Show(ddb.getError());
4651  ddb.closeConnection();
4652  }
4653  else
4654  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4655  db.closeConnection();
4656  }
4657  else if (dbs.result->GetInt32(0) == 0)
4658  {
4659  String^ query = "INSERT INTO provides_items(id_provides, id_items, quantity) VALUES('" + this->rowIdDelivery + "', (SELECT id_items from items WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'), '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "')";
4660  dbDriver db;
4661  db.insert(query);
4662  if (db.getStatus())
4663  {
4664  String^ qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity=quantity + '" + this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text + "' WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'";
4665  dbDriver ddb;
4666  ddb.update(qquery);
4667  if (ddb.getStatus())
4668  {
4669  MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot dodany");
4670  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4671  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4672  }
4673  else
4674  MessageBox::Show(ddb.getError());
4675  ddb.closeConnection();
4676  }
4677  else
4678  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4679  db.closeConnection();
4680  }
4681  }
4682  else
4683  {
4684  MessageBox::Show(dbs.getError());
4685  dbs.closeConnection();
4686  }
4687  }
4688  catch (int ex)
4689  {
4690  if (ex == 1)
4691  MessageBox::Show("Ilo dostarczonego przedmiotu musi by wiksza od 0");
4692  if (ex == 2)
4693  MessageBox::Show("Wybierz przedmiot ktry jest dostarczony");
4694  }
4695  }
4696 
4697  private: System::Void comboBoxDeliveryItem_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4698  this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = true;
4699  String^ query = "SELECT count(provides_items.id_provides), provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items inner join items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'";
4700  dbDriver db;
4701  db.selectOne(query);
4702  if (db.getStatus())
4703  {
4704  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
4705  {
4706  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = db.result->GetString(1);
4707  this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = true;
4708  }
4709  }
4710  else
4711  {
4712  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4713  db.closeConnection();
4714  }
4715  }
4716 
4717  private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDeleteItem_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4718  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun przedmiot z transakcji?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
4719  {
4720  String^ qquery = "SELECT provides_items.quantity FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "' and provides_items.id_provides= '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4721  dbDriver dbqq;
4722  dbqq.selectOne(qquery);
4723  if (dbqq.getStatus())
4724  {
4725  String^ query = "DELETE provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN items on items.id_items = provides_items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "' and provides_items.id_items=(SELECT id_items from items where concat(items.name, ' ', items.model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "')";
4726  dbDriver db;
4727  db.deleteFromSql(query);
4728  if (db.getStatus())
4729  {
4730  MessageBox::Show("Przedmiot zosta usunity z transakcji");
4731  String^ qquery = "UPDATE items SET quantity = quantity - '" + dbqq.result->GetString(0) + "' WHERE concat(name, ' ', model) = '" + this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text + "'";
4732  dbDriver dbq;
4733  dbq.update(qquery);
4734  if (dbq.getStatus())
4735  {
4736  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, provides_items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price * provides_items.quantity as Cena from items INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items INNER JOIN producers ON producers.id_producers = items.id_producers INNER JOIN provides on provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_provides ='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4737  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4738  }
4739  else
4740  MessageBox::Show(dbq.getError());
4741  dbq.closeConnection();
4742  }
4743  else
4744  {
4745  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4746  db.closeConnection();
4747  }
4748  }
4749  else
4750  MessageBox::Show(dbqq.getError());
4751  dbqq.closeConnection();
4752  }
4753  }
4754 
4755  private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryItems_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
4756  if (this->rowIdDelivery >= 0)
4757  {
4758  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[1]->Value->ToString() + " " + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[2]->Value->ToString();
4759  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[4]->Value->ToString();
4760  }
4761  else
4762  {
4763  String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_klienta, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides= provides_items.id_provides WHERE provides_items.id_items = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'";
4764  this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery);
4765  }
4766  }
4767 
4768  private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClose_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4769  String^ query = "UPDATE provides SET status = 1, price=(SELECT SUM(provides_items.quantity*items.price) from provides_items INNER JOIN items ON provides_items.id_items = items.id_items WHERE provides_items.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "') WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4770  dbDriver db;
4771  db.update(query);
4772  if (db.getStatus())
4773  {
4774  MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa zamknita");
4775  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false;
4776  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false;
4777  this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false;
4778  this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false;
4779  this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false;
4780  }
4781  else
4782  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4783  db.closeConnection();
4784  }
4785 
4786  private: System::Void buttonDeliveryDelete_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4787  String^ query = "Select status, count(provides_items.id_provides) from provides INNER JOIN provides_items ON provides.id_provides = provides_items.id_provides where provides.id_provides='" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4788  dbDriver db;
4789  db.selectOne(query);
4790  if (db.getStatus())
4791  {
4792  if (db.result->GetInt32(0) == 1)
4793  {
4794  if (MessageBox::Show("Czy chcesz usun transakcje?", "", MessageBoxButtons::YesNo, MessageBoxIcon::Question) == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::Yes)
4795  {
4796  String^ dquery;
4797  if (db.result->GetInt32(1) > 0)
4798  dquery = "DELETE provides, provides_items FROM provides_items INNER JOIN provides ON provides_items.id_provides = provides.id_provides WHERE provides.id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4799  else if (db.result->GetInt32(1) == 0)
4800  dquery = "DELETE FROM provides WHERE id_provides = '" + this->rowIdDelivery + "'";
4801  dbDriver dbd;
4802  dbd.deleteFromSql(dquery);
4803  if (dbd.getStatus())
4804  {
4805  MessageBox::Show("Transakcja zostaa usunita");
4806  String^ DeliveryQuery = "SELECT id_provides as Id_dostawy, id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, id_providers as Id_klienta, date as Data, price as Kwota_transakcji, status from provides";
4807  this->bindTable(DeliveryQuery, this->dataGridViewDelivery);
4808 
4809  String^ ItemsQuery = "Select items.id_items as id , items.name as Nazwa, items.model, producers.name as Producent, items.quantity as Ilosc, items.price as Cena from items INNER JOIN producers ON items.id_producers = producers.id_producers";
4810  this->bindTable(ItemsQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryItems);
4811 
4812  String^ ProvidersQuery = "Select providers.id_providers as id , providers.name as Nazwa, common_data.email, common_data.phone as NrTelefonu from providers INNER JOIN common_data ON providers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data";
4813  this->bindTable(ProvidersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders);
4814 
4815  String^ EmployersQuery = "Select employers.id_employers as id , employers.login, employers.name as Imie, employers.surname as Nazwisko, common_data.email from employers INNER JOIN common_data ON employers.cdata = common_data.id_common_data";
4816  bindTable(EmployersQuery, this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers);
4817  this->clearFormDelivery();
4818  }
4819  else
4820  MessageBox::Show(dbd.getError());
4821  dbd.closeConnection();
4822  }
4823  }
4824  else
4825  MessageBox::Show("Musisz zamkn transakcje przed usuniciem");
4826  }
4827  else
4828  MessageBox::Show(db.getError());
4829  db.closeConnection();
4830  }
4831 
4832  private: System::Void buttonDeliveryClearForm_Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^ e) {
4833  this->clearFormDelivery();
4834  }
4835 
4836  private: Void clearFormDelivery() {
4837  this->labelDeliveryIDVal->Text = "#";
4838  this->comboBoxDeliveryProvider->Enabled = true;
4839  this->rowIdDelivery = -1;
4840  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Text = "";
4841  this->buttonDeliverySave->Enabled = true;
4842  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Items->Clear();
4843  this->comboBoxDeliveryItem->Enabled = false;
4844  this->maskedTextBoxDeliveryQuantity->Enabled = false;
4845  this->buttonDeliveryAddItem->Enabled = false;
4846  this->buttonDeliveryDeleteItem->Enabled = false;
4847  this->buttonDeliveryClose->Enabled = false;
4848  this->buttonDeliveryDelete->Enabled = false;
4849  this->buttonDeliveryClearForm->Enabled = false;
4850  }
4851 
4852  private: System::Void dataGridViewDeliveryProviders_CellClick(System::Object^ sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^ e) {
4853  if (this->rowIdDelivery < 0)
4854  {
4855  String^ Query = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_dostawcy, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides WHERE provides.id_providers = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryProviders->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'";
4856  this->bindTable(Query, this->dataGridViewDelivery);
4857  }
4858  }
4859

4861  if (this->rowIdDelivery < 0)
4862  {
4863  String^ Query = "SELECT provides.id_provides as Id_sprzedazy, provides.id_employers as Id_sprzedawcy, provides.id_providers as Id_dostawcy, provides.date as Data, provides.price as Kwota_transakcji, provides.status from provides WHERE provides.id_employers = '" + this->dataGridViewDeliveryEmployers->Rows[e->RowIndex]->Cells[0]->Value->ToString() + "'";
4864  this->bindTable(Query, this->dataGridViewDelivery);
4865  }
4866  }

4869  MessageBox::Show(
4870  "Dostawa - Instrukcja obsugi\n"
4871  + "Wybierz dostawce z listy a nastpnie nacinij Dodaj transakcje\n"
4872  + "Po dodaniu transakcji moesz dodawa do niej przedmioty i okrela ich ilo oraz je usuwa␀n" + "Aby usun ca transakcje naley j wczeniej zamkn\n" + "Po zakmniciu transakcji nie ma moliwo dodawania do niej przedmiotw\n" ); } }; } \n"
4873  + "Aby usun ca transakcje naley j wczeniej zamkn␀n" + "Po zakmniciu transakcji nie ma moliwo dodawania do niej przedmiotw\n" ); } }; } \n"
